text: Cecilia Dahlman (born 24 July 1968Tennis explorer) is a retired Swedish tennis player, who played professionally between mid 1980s and 1993. ==Tennis career== Cecilia Dahlman won two WTA singles titles during her career, the Athens Open in 1989 and 1990. She also represented Sweden in the Fed Cup. ==WTA Tour finals== ===Singles 2=== {| class="wikitable sortable mw- collapsible mw-collapsed" |- bgcolor="#efefef" |colspan=2|Legend |- bgcolor="#f3e6d7" |
